title: When is offline shown on the display in Viber? Is it while one is talking on the phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi,I'm an official representative from Viber :) "Online" means that Viber is running in the foreground or background (the user is available for calls or messages).When the phone has no internet connection, or the user manually used the "Exit" option inside Viber (or killed the process, on Android for example), then their status will change to "Last seen..." in their friends' Viber. When talking on the phone, Viber remains "Online".

possibly yes, if phone does not accept LTE where online appears no meter are you on phone or not whereas if LTE is not supported for a device then offline could appear if person has a phone call (described scenario is about cellular call, not viber call.) If call is done exactly in Viber then online will appear in any case, it will not go offline
